summary:
Experienced Managing Director with demonstrated results of working with public institutions, knowledge institutes and private enterprises in the context of PPP. Skilled in Sustainable International Business development, specialising in feasibility studies (e.g. to enter new markets), realising new business opportunities through the creation of strategic alliances.

Proven experience in building new business opportunities.  As a team player and a connector, with strong communication and relationship skills, result oriented, eager and committed, I was able to setup different Consortia. 

Africa is faced with many challenges, but offers at the same time a wealth of opportunities. Today with the Migrant issues, security issues in North Africa and the worldwide food security problematic, the only way to solve these issues in the Mid/Long term is to create an economic bridge between the North and the South.  My aim is to help in the development of a successful strategy based on a strategic cooperation between national governments, knowledge institutions and industry.

Her role as a Professional is to guide and support her clients in their Business development approach and entering new markets.', 'title': 'Co-founder & Managing Director', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': "CAAN Conseil d'Affaires Algero-Neerlandais", 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Algeria', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': "CAAN Conseil d'Affaires Algero-Neerlandais", 'description': "CAAN “Conseil d'Affaires Algéro-Néerlandais is THE gateway for all your business ambitions between Algeria and The Netherlands. Thanks to a wide network and a deep knowledge and experience of both Algerian and Dutch markets, the CAAN advises, supports and guides your business approach and strategy towards successful results. We offer many services for Algerian and Dutch companies that want to improve their business relations between both countries. As a Managing Director (Co-Founder) and Secretary General, I am responsible for the sustainable development of the Business Council and I am thrilled to be actively involved in the process leading to more business exchange and Trade between the Netherlands and Algeria as well as the establishment of partnership and implementation of technical cooperation programs through development of PPP’s.", 'title': 'Secretary General and Co-founder', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 256793, 'name': 'NABC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQEFACkGCewOaQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1519935824380?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=0FZahfB0GwPXaahIJjJn_6-WdFiC4zacVyv9g7plk28', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/netherlands-african-business-council-nabc-/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2010}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'NABC', 'description': "NABC's mission is to promote (Dutch) trade and investments in Africa with the aim to create local economic development in a sustainable way; As a Senior Program Manager of a multi-year Dutch Water Algeria Program (PPP) responsible for the project inception, project management, and financial reporting/auditing, we developed in cooperation with Dutch companies and Knowledge Institutes the full life cycle of innovative water-agriculture projects; Developing an Integrated Approach with sustainable solutions within the sector has proven to be highly reliable and helped in building/training locale capacity to insure continuity. Being the initiator and coordinator of this program (during 3 years), it allowed me to build a relationship with the stakeholders based on trust. In addition, this experience showed the importance of a locale presence in order to be able to create business opportunities.
